ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to express gratitude to Dr. Pedro Alzari (Pasteur Institute, France), for providing the plasmids for the overexpression of DQPknB and GarA. This work was supported by the Ley Orgánica de Ciencia, Tecnología e Innovación LOCTI-Venezuela (grant: Nuevos Fármacos Contra la Tuberculosis) and the Universidad Santiago de Cali (DGI project no. 934-6211118-49).
